data.name: Polyspell
data.detailed_description:
Polyspell is a survival RPG game where you play as a wizard sent to the alternate dimension to train to be a wizard. You will harvest, mine, fish, craft, build, and brew your way into a strong wizard. You can explore and find a perfect spot for a base and build up there. You can craft armor, weapons, tools, and even spells to help you along your way. Every 5 days a Titan will come to test your progression, will you prevail, or will you die?




The world of Polyspell brings several islands for the player to explore. The player is stuck on the main island until they find the tools for water traversal but afterwards the player can find different biomes to explore with different points of interest and material to gather.




The player has access to many different styles of combat and ways to fight enemies. The player can use melee and a bow for ranged combat. The player can also craft spells and use spells, a staff, and even a melee weapon if they choose to. It’s completely up to the player. There are plans for many different spells the player can craft to use in battle.



Every so often in the world of Polyspell the player will be attacked by a different titan. Each titan drops different material the player can use to craft tools and armor with. There are also other events such as monsoons, meteor strikes, sandstorms, and other events which bring out different mobs in the world.

data.short_description: Polyspell is a survival RPG based in a fantasy land where you manage a base that you build against titans. Place traps, create spells, craft weapons, fight off the titans and become stronger to prove your worthy of becoming a wizard

content_descriptors.notes: There is a lot of killing animals/creatures/and enemy mobs.
